com.code10.kts.controller

Class MeetingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.code10.kts.controller.MeetingController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/buildings/{buildingId}/meetings")
public class MeetingController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing buildings' meetings.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @PostMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity create(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                      long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                      MeetingCreateDto meetingCreateDto)
        POST /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings Creates a new meeting for a building.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        meetingCreateDto - DTO with meeting's information
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with created meeting's ID

      • createReport

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}/report")
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createReport(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                 long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                 long id,
                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                 ReportCreateDto reportCreateDto)
        PUT /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings/ID Creates a report for building's meeting.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        id - building's meeting ID
        reportCreateDto - DTO with meeting's report information
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with meeting containing its report

 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity delete(@PathVariable

                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                       long id)

 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.hasAccessTo(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity findAll(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                   long buildingId,

 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.hasAccessTo(#buildingId)")

      • update

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity update(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                    long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                    long id,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                    MeetingUpdateDto meetingUpdateDto)
        PUT /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings/ID Updates an existing building's meeting.

        buildingId - building ID
        id - building's meeting ID
